165.title: Continues with Keith Sweat!/Fellow Comedian Mike Epps from "Uncle Buck"/Lifetime's Susan Lucci & Dania Ramirez
165.plot: Comedian Mike Epps joins the show to talk about his new sitcom, Uncle Buck (2016), and helps Steve counsel a couple who are at odds over the use of profanity; actresses Susan Lucci and Dania Ramirez from Devious Maids (2013) stop by; singer Keith Sweat performs.

166.title: Continues with Bobby Brown! Bobby Gives Viewers a Sneak Peek at His New Memoir/Kym Whitley's "Recycle Your Ex" Party
166.plot: Singer Bobby Brown joins the show to talk about his memoir, "Every Little Step"; comedian Kym Whitley shares her dating issues with Steve; interior designer Mikel Welch shows viewers weekend projects for the summer, including building a backyard pergola; Janelle Inez prepares an iced coffee.

167.title: Steve Crowns the "Dad of the Year" for Father's Day!/Steve's Son Jason Debuts His New Women's Shoe Line Called Yevrah/Men of 90s R&B Week
167.plot: Viewers from across the country share stories about their fathers; four fathers will compete for the title of "Dad of the Year" and a $10,000 check; Steve's son Jason features his women's shoe line; Montell Jordan makes an appearance.

168.title: Steve Catches Up with Melissa Rivers/"Men of the 90's R&B Week" Wraps Up with a Performance by Ginuwine!
168.plot: Melissa Rivers joins the show to talk about her mother's legacy and other personal stories from her "The Book of Joan"; founder of Awakening Herbal Blends, Ladell Hills shares how to cleanse the body; singer Ginuwine stops by.

169.title: Steve Kicks Off the "Summer of Steve" with a Look Back at Episodes That Didn't Go as Planned
169.plot: Talk Show host Ellen DeGeneres hijacks an "Ask Steve" segment; an interview with reality star Brandi Glanville; YouTube star Auntie Fee visits; an interview with Jerry Seinfeld; the Queen of Prancercise surprises Steve Harvey

170.title: The "Summer of Steve" Continues as Steve Looks Back at Some of His Favorite Surprise Moments
170.plot: Steve Harvey reviews some of the best surprise moments on the show; a look at past birthday shows for Steve; a recap of Steve's favorite moment on the show, when his wife and children shared their best memories of him; Steve's grandchildren appear.

171.title: Steve Looks Back at Some of His Favorite Talk-Show Moments; 50 Couples
171.plot: Steve reflects on his interviews with President Barack Obama and Michelle Obama; a look at over the-top moments from "United Dates of America"; a look back at 50 on-set marriage ceremonies; Steve and Wynton's bubble suit battle.

172.title: Steve Takes a Trip Down Memory Lane, with a Look Back at the 500th Episode of the Show/Steve Highlights More of His Favorite Episodes!
172.plot: A look at the best moments from the show's 500th episode; a review of how one tech-obsessed family dealt with a ban on all electronics for a 48-hour time span; a look back at when Steve taught his children to drive; "Date Your Husband" campaign moments.

173.title: Steve Looks Back at His Favorite Kid Moments on the Talk Show; Favorite Guests; 100-Year-Old Best Friends
173.plot: A Look back at some of Steve Harvey's favorite moments where children showcased their talents on the show; a review of some of the top "United Dates of America" segments; a pair of 100-year-old best friends; Steve learns how to be Amish.

174.title: Steve Checks in from Summer Vacation with a Montage of the Worst Ideas His Producers Have Ever Had!
174.plot: Steve looks back at his least favorite moments on the show. Included: exercise routines and fitness trends; beauty segments; Steve's first-ever colonoscopy; and outrageous Halloween outfits.

175.title: Steve Looks Back at Some Moments That Were Perhaps a Bit More Appropriate for a Late-Night Show!
175.plot: Steve recalls series moments that may have been better suited for a late-night show. Included: segments about people's sex lives; a romance tutorial; "love products"; a racy cooking segment; and interviews with Sherri Shepherd and Martha Stewart.

176.title: Never-Before-Seen Footage from "Steve Harvey"; Glimpse at What Happens During Commercial Breaks
176.plot: Steve shares top off-camera moments from the show. Included: previously unseen footage; behind-the-scenes clips; comedy during commercial breaks; and a look at the show's comedian who warms up the audience.

177.title: Steve Checks in from Summer Vacation to Reveal Some of His Favorite Moments on the Show
177.plot: Steve recaps his most memorable moments in the four-year history of the show. Included: a 1970s-theme episode; a dating makeover for four nerds; a lesson in curling; and a woman who claimed her man was too sexy.

178.title: Steve Reminisces About Some of His Favorite Guests, Including a Neat Freak Derailing His Own Sex Life
178.plot: Steve looks back at some of his favorite guests. Included: a neat freak derailing his sex life; an 86-year-old woman who wrote a steamy romance novel; a heroic subway worker; a battle for the top deep-dish pizza in Chicago; and a hog-calling champ.

179.title: Pastor Paula White Helps a Couple That Can't Agree on Religion: She's a Pastor and He's Agnostic!/Steve Intervenes to Help Three Co-Workers
179.plot: Pastor Paula White helps a married couple at odds over religion; Steve tries to help three makeup-studio co-workers resolve a work conflict.

180.title: Larry Birkhead Talks About Being a Single Dad and Raising His Daughter Dannielynn!/Sisters with Voices (SWV) Reunites!
180.plot: Steve interviews Larry Birkhead, partner of the late Anna Nicole Smith and father of her daughter, Dannielynn; the reunited R&B girl group Sisters With Voices (known as SWV) perform: a family who threw a big-bucks birthday bash for their daughter.

181.title: Three Sisters Secretly Set Their Oldest Sister Up with a Man/Love Story/Obsessive-Compulsive Behavior
181.plot: Three sisters secretly play matchmaker for their elder sister, by handpicking a man for her. Also: the love story of a woman who married the man who donated part of his liver to her; a day in the life of a woman with obsessive compulsive disorder (OCD).

182.title: Steve Helps Three Women Who Are Going on a Love Strike!/Extraordinary Stories of Weight Loss!
182.plot: Steve helps three romantically-challenged women, who've declared they're going on a love strike. Also: extraordinary weight loss stories in America are shared.

183.title: Steve Surprises an Olympic Medalist by Having Her Bobsled Teammates Pick a Date for Her!
183.plot: Olympic medalist Aja Evans visits the show and receives assistance with her dating life; a look at the public's relationship with cops, while stories are shared regarding officers; author Alan Fox discusses his foundation, Youth Philanthropy Connect.

184.title: Sorority Sisters Try to Mend Their Fractured Friendship/"Travel Mom" Emily Kaufman's Top Picks for Wellness Vacations
184.plot: Host Steve Harvey tries to help two women, who were sorority sisters, become friends again after one of them betrayed her sorority by joining a reality show; Emily Kaufman comes on the show to discusses wellness vacations.

185.title: Chicago Gun Violence: Part 2/Steve's Follow-up Episode, with Never-Before Seen Footage and Updates from the Show
185.plot: The show takes a second look at the topic of gun violence in Chicago by interview a former gang member; a look at the number of number of murders taken place in Chicago and how many of them were unsolved last year; congressman Bobby Rush, and rappers Moncy and King Louie are interviewed.

186.title: Is It Science or Science Fiction? Scientists Help Steve Get to the Bottom of Common Misconceptions/DLOW Shows Off His Latest Dance Craze!
186.plot: Huffington post science editor Jacqueline Howard and Dr. Daniel Caspi to talk about the difference between science and science fiction; Steve gives a lesson in the "D-low shuffle"; educator Ron Clark talks about philanthropy.

1.title: Steve Kicks Off Season Five with a Surprise from LeBron James!/Comedic Legend Jay Leno Gives Steve a Cool Ride in a Vintage Car!
1.plot: Professional basketball star LeBron James sends Steve a surprise message; comedian Jay Leno discuss his career and gives Steve a ride in a vintage car; Olympic gold medalist Simone Manuel talks about competing in Rio; Tika Sumpter and Parker Sawyers of Southside with You (2016).

2.title: NeNe Leakes and Sheryl Underwood with Behind-the-Scenes Stories from Celebrity Family Feud
2.plot: Steve revisits his favorite "Family Feud (1999)" moments from the past seven years and catches up with contestants who provided the most outrageous responses, making them viral video sensations; NeNe Leakes and Sheryl Underwood visits the show.

3.title: Steve Goes Country with Dolly Parton/Steve Helps a Pro Bull Rider Find the Cowboy of Her Dreams
3.plot: Country music legend Dolly Parton joins Steve to help kick off "Steve Goes Country Hour"; Steve tries to help a female pro bull rider find the man of her dreams; BBQ master Myron Mixon helps Steve, with the "Great American Food Fight: Country Edition", by judging the pulled pork competition; and Steve honors a cowboy who lassoed a would-be thief.

4.title: It's the "Summer Update Hour"! An Update with Couples Featured in Last Season's "Summer of Sex" Experiment
4.plot: Steve shares his discussions with a group of couples about getting their sex lives back on track; some couples were told not to have sex all summer and some were told to have sex everyday; a behind-the-scenes look at The Neighborhood Awards. Also: an update on sisters who discovered that their DNA matched another woman who claimed to be their long-lost sibling.

5.title: Mel B from NBC's "America's Got Talent"/The Results of Dolvett Quince's Biggest Loser Challenge Between Viewers/Uber
5.plot: Celebrity judge Mel B from "America's Got Talent (2006)"; "The Biggest Loser (2004)" trainer Dolvett Quince and the three viewers who set out to lose weight visits the show for their final weigh-in; a lesson on using Uber; a man reveals his 200-pound weight loss.

6.title: Steve Welcomes Sheryl Underwood, Judy Gold and Liz Hernandez for the First Panel of the Season/Regina Hall from "When the Bough Breaks"
6.plot: "The Talk (2010)" co-host Sheryl Underwood, comic and actress Judy Gold and "Access Hollywood (1996)" host Liz Hernandez discusses controversial headline topics; actress Regina Hall from "When the Bough Breaks (2016)"; a "Harvey's Hero" is honored.

7.title: Two of Your Favorite Reality Families, the Chrisley and the Manzos, Compete in the Sunday Supper Showdown!
7.plot: A "sunday supper showdown" competition between the Chrisley family of Chrisley Knows Best (2014) and the Manzo family of Manzo'd with Children (2014); a single mother shares the story of four teenagers who saved her after a car accident.

8.title: It's the "Battle" of the Sexes, Part 2!/"60 Days In"/Men & Women Weigh in on Topics of Gender Roles That Divide Us
8.plot: Males and females discuss gender roles as the role of women continues to evolve; documentary subjects from "60 Days In (2016)" visit the show; "Love at First Kiss (2016)" star Joshua Basili discusses his attempt at making a connection with his first kiss.

9.plot: Television personality Martha Stewart prepares recipes from her cookbook "Vegetables" and discusses dating on Match.com; "Dr. Drew on Call (2011)" host Dr. Drew Pinsky holds an intervention for "Pokémon Go" addicts; a look at Steve Harvey's golf tournament.

10.plot: Steve offers a comical look at topical headlines; a "Happy Wife, Happy Life" theme features women airing grievances about their husbands. Also: Omari Hardwick and Joseph Sikora of Power (2014); and a look at Steve's Mentoring Camp for Boys.

11.title: Exclusive: An Entire Hour with Magic and Cookie Johnson, Who for the First Time Will Do a Joint Interview with Two of Their Children
11.plot: Magic Johnson, his wife, Cookie Johnson, and two of their children, E.J. Johnson and Elisa Johnson ("EJ NYC").

12.title: Steve Takes Viewers Behind the Scenes at "Little Big Shots"/Cupping & Cryotherapy... Do They Work?/Kristin Cavallari Helps a Woman
12.plot: Steve teams with Kristin Cavallari to play matchmaker for a woman by taking her to a tailgating party. Also: a look at two forms of alternative medicine; John David Washington, of the series Ballers (2015); a backstage peek at the show, Little Big Shots (2016).

13.title: Steve's Town Hall on Policing and Race Relations/A Diverse Audience Full of Police Officers, Members of the Black Lives Matter Movement
13.plot: Steve devotes an entire hour to a "Race and Policing Town Hall", with insight provided by police officers, members of the Black Lives Matter movement, victims of police violence, plus music artists Game and Coffey Anderson.

15.title: Steve Teams with Kym Whitley and Ford to Honor Amazing Women All Week!/Verdine White, from Steve's All-Time Favorite Group!
15.plot: Steve Harvey teams up Kym Whitley and Ford to honor amazing women by picking them up in a "Cash Car" and taking them around town; the women include a mother of a girl with down syndrome.

16.plot: Steve Harvey brings Michelle from New Orleans in to help her with her dating life and share some dating techniques; Steve teams up with Kym Whitley and ford to help outstanding women and celebrate them with the audiences.

17.plot: Steve Harvey celebrates his favorite feel-good stories including videos of himself; Steve teams up Kym Whitley and Ford to help outstanding women including one who created anti-gang program for at risk teens.

18.plot: Steve Harvey talks to a bachelor about his love and dating life; Steve teams up with friend Kym Whitley and Ford to help outstanding women including one who adopted the four children of her best friend who passed away.

19.plot: Steve Harvey talks to Joshua Basili from TLC's "Love at First Kiss (2016)" after an awkward moment on the show; up with friend Kym Whitley and Ford to help outstanding women including one who saved a woman and her child.

Also: plus-size fashions with stylist Tim Snell.

23.plot: Steve finds 100 women who say they have decided to be done with dating for good to be the studio audience and takes on the challenge of convincing them to change their minds with the help of actor Shemar Moore from "Criminal Minds (2005)".

24.plot: Steve is joined by a woman who is ready to start dating again, after breaking off her wedding weeks before the day, and presents her with eligible men and harsher family questions; lifestyle expert Kelli Zink Levy shares the "top stress remedies"; and Dr. John Duffy offers a perspective on quirky habits.

26.plot: Steve Harvey presents the "Stepmom Summit 2.0!" in which stepmothers, stepfathers and stepchildren work on making their blended families successful; wife of Al Roker and stepmother, Deborah Roberts joins comic Sarah Colonna.

27.plot: Steve talks with a man named Sebastian who hacked tinders algorithm and matched with 12,000 women in the hopes of finding love; chef Rick Bayless talks about his food inspired by the late Julia Childs and stories inspired by her.

28.plot: Steve welcomes an audience of women that are all going through divorce and offers them help; "The Real Housewives of New Jersey (2009)" Siggy Flicker talk about the trials of her own divorce and how she kept things amicable with her former husband.

29.title: Steve Helps a Woman Whose Pastor Hubby Acts Like He's Married to the Church! A High School Senior Surprises His Teacher
29.plot: Steve talks with a couple that is struggling with balance between their relationship and their religion; a high school senior surprises his favorite coach with the honor of a "Harvey's Hero" and a pair of Nike Air Jordan's that he bought himself. Also: Hannah Kasulka of TV's The Exorcist (2016).

30.title: A 10-Year-Old Boy Who Donated His Hair/BET's Gary Owen and His Wife/Obsessed with Elvis/Police Officer
30.plot: Steve welcomes a 10-year-old boy who donated his hair to help children with cancer; a woman claims her husband is obsessed with Elvis; BET personality Gary Owen and his wife; a police officer who paid it forward to help a woman.

31.title: Sterling K. Brown from NBC's "This Is Us"/Bill and Giuliana Rancic/Husband's Addiction
31.plot: Actor Sterling K. Brown (This Is Us (2016)) is interviewed; Bill Rancic and Giuliana Rancic help a single mother revamp her Chicago restaurant; a couple seek help for the husband's addiction to pornography.

32.title: Exclusive Sit-Down Interview with NFL Great Kordell Stewart/Mom Who Uses Hypnosis/Dating Apps
32.plot: Steve welcomes a mother who uses hypnosis to keep her children in line; Steve interviews football personality Kordell Stewart; matchmaker Bela Gandhi highlights dating apps.

33.title: A Surprise Reunion for Long-Distance Lovers/Signs That You May Be at Risk for a Heart Attack/Animal Expert Jeff Musial
33.plot: Steve stages a surprise reunion for a couple in a long-distance relationship; animal expert Jeff Musial spotlights unconventional household pets; information about heart attacks.

34.title: Steve Welcomes Fellow Comedian Wanda Sykes/NeNe Leakes Stops by to Help Dish Out Advice to Women/Act of Kindness
34.plot: Steve interviews comedian Wanda Sykes; a good-news story centers on a McDonald's manager's act of kindness; NeNe Leakes offers relationship advice to two women.

35.title: Keesha Sharp from Fox's "Lethal Weapon"/"30 Day Date Experiment: Exes Edition"/LeeAnn Trotter
35.plot: Three women willing to give their ex-boyfriends another chance; Keesha Sharp (Lethal Weapon (2016)); LeeAnn Trotter, entertainment reporter for NBC 5 in Chicago. Animal Expert Jeff Musial

36.title: Steve's Son-in-Law Ben Helps a Single Mom/Super Rich with CNBC's Robert Frank
36.plot: Steve's son-in-law, Ben Raymond, mentors fatherless boys; Robert Frank (Secret Lives of the Super Rich (2013)) gives a glimpse into the homes of some super-wealthy celebrities.

37.title: Chrissy Metz from NBC's "This Is Us"! Steve's Daughter Brandi Talks About the Girls Who Rule the World Program
37.plot: A mentoring program for teen girls; Miss USA Deshauna Barber; Steve's daughter Morgan makes a Jamaican dish; Olympian Usain Bolt; Chrissy Metz (This Is Us (2016)); Stefun Darts goes to college.

38.plot: Terry Crews (Brooklyn Nine-Nine (2013) and Ultimate Beastmaster (2017)) is the guest; a "Lip Sync Battle" featuring Steve, Crews and the soul group, The O'Jays; Greg McKeown, author of "Essentialism: The Disciplined Pursuit of Less".

39.title: An Entire Hour with Actor, Writer, Producer and Director Tyler Perry/Boo! A Madea Halloween
39.plot: Steve talks with actor and director Tyler Perry at his Los Angeles home about his success from a humble childhood to a prolific career; Steve talks to cast members of the movie, "Boo: A Madea Halloween" (2016), from the red carpet premiere.

40.title: It's the "Coming to America" - Themed Halloween Show
40.plot: Shari Headley and Vanessa Bell Calloway (Coming to America (1988)); Ta'Rhonda Jones (Empire (2015)); Jeff Musial brings African animals; magician Mat Franco (America's Got Talent (2006)).

41.plot: Steve Harvey shares tips from his book "Jump"; supermodel Tyra Banks shares the story of how she built her brand; two sisters receive a chance to jump start their cosmetic careers; Steve presents his open 21-day jump challenge.

42.title: Steve Continues "Jump Week!"/Platinum-Selling Artist Kelly Clarkson Talks Career & Family!/Billionaire Founder of Spandex, Sara Blakely
42.plot: Inaugural "American Idol (2002)" winner Kelly Clarkson shares how she built up her career and is now an author (book, "River Rose and the Magical Lullaby"); Spanx founder Sara Blakely discusses her success story; a woman looks to start her teaching career; life coach coach Doreen Rainey visits the show.

43.title: Continues with "Real Housewife" and Creator of SkinnyGirl Brand
43.plot: Television personality and entrepreneur Bethenny Frankel presents what led her to build a $25 million Empire; a woman receives help in pursuing a baking career; DHerbs full Body Cleanse creator A.D. Dolphin visits the show.

44.title: Steve Wraps Up "Jump Week" with Business Moguls Earvin Magic Johnson and Mark Cuban/DHerbs' A.D. Dolphin Gives Each Audience Member $1,000
44.plot: Retired Basketball player Earvin "Magic Johnson shares how he built up NBA career; "Shark Tank (2009)" star Mark Cuban shares the story of his success; DHerbs Full Body Cleanse creator A.D Dolphin gives $1,000 to audience members.

45.title: The TV Debut of Steve's Newest Grandson! Catch Up with Steve's Daughter Karli and Her Husband, Ben
45.plot: Karli Harvey, Ben Raymond and little BJ stop by; the people behind some of Steve's favorite viral videos.

46.title: Steve's Comedic Take on the Election, with an Installment of "The Way I See It!"/Steve Chats with a Group of Kids About Politics
46.plot: Steve gives his comedic take on all of the crazy things that have happened in the presidential race; Steve helps an election volunteer find a date; Steve talks to young children about politics; André Holland (Moonlight (2016)).

47.plot: Steve kicks off a quest to have six-pack abs by the time he turns 60 in January. He receives advice from fitness guru Jorge Cruise, who also helps a group of women meet their weight-loss goals.

48.title: An Update with Steve's "30-Day Date" Couples, Before They Move in Together!/Omar Epps on His New Movie, "Almost Christmas"/Smoothie Recipes
48.plot: Steve provides an update on his "30-Day Date" couples, before they move in together; Omar Epps highlights his film, Almost Christmas (2016); smoothie recipes for the holidays.

49.plot: Steve takes questions via Skype from military members in Kuwait and Iraq; Steve helps a veteran get a job offer and a home; comic Rubin Ervin goes to boot camp and gets a family reunion.

50.title: Kicks Off with Steve's Epic Reunion with the Original Kings of Comedy: D.L. Hughley & Cedric the Entertainer
50.plot: Comics D.L. Hughley, Cedric the Entertainer, Guy Torry and Mike Epps; the late Bernie Mac's family.

51.title: with George Lopez! Taraji P. Henson, from Fox's "Empire", Talks About Her New Book
51.plot: Comic George Lopez (Lopez (2016)); Taraji P. Henson (Empire (2015)); Fortune Feimster (The Mindy Project (2012)).

52.title: with Comedian, Film, and TV Star Tim Allen! Steve Introduces Viewers to Dulcé Sloan, Winner of StandUp NBC
52.plot: Comedian Tim Allen from Last Man Standing (2011)" discusses his start in comedy and what it was like growing up with a widowed mother of seven; up and coming comedian and winner of "Stand up NBC" Dulcé Sloan is the featured Laughs: Comedians You Should Know (2016)".

53.title: A True Comedy Groundbreaker, Margaret Cho!/Actor, Rapper and Recording Artist Common Performs the Title Track of His New Album
53.plot: Comedian, author and television star Margaret Cho from E!'s Fashion Police (2002)" discusses her upbringing in San Francisco, and offending her own audience; musical guest Common performs his song "Black America Again"; comedian D.C. Young Fly

54.plot: Comedian David Alan Grier from The Carmichael Show (2015) discusses his time at the Yale Drama School, and his time on the show In Living Color (1990); Julian McCullough is the featured Laughs: Comedians You Should Know (2016); the Turkey Day classic is discussed.

55.title: Steve Spends the Entire Hour with Oprah Winfrey at Her LA-Based OWN Network Headquarters! Oprah Gives Viewers a Tour!
55.plot: Legendary television personality Oprah Winfrey invites Steve to visit OWN headquarters, where she discusses her start in the industry; actors Kofi Siriboe, Rutina Wesley and Dawn-Lyen Gardner from "Queen Sugar (2016) discuss working with Oprah.

56.title: Lisa Ling from CNN's "This Is Life" with a Preview of Her Episode Featuring Women Married to Men Behind Bars!
56.plot: The finale of Steve's 30-Day Date experiment; Lisa Ling and Takita McKinney (This Is Life with Lisa Ling (2014)) discuss women falling in love with men behind bars; two ways to prepare a Thanksgiving turkey without using the oven.

57.plot: Steve helps an opinionated family settle their seasonal differences in "Thanksgiving 911"; Judge Lauren Lake (Lauren Lake's Paternity Court (2013)) leads the "Harvey's Law" segment; shopping and trends specialist Sara Skirboll shares her Black Friday bargains.

58.title: Real Housewife Countess LuAnn De Lesseps Talks About Her Upcoming New Year's Eve Wedding!/Fashion Tips from Style Pro Carson Kressley!
58.plot: Countess Luann de Lesseps (The Real Housewives of New York City (2008)); TV personality/author Carson Kressley (book, "Does This Make My Butt Look Big?").

59.title: Comedian Kathy Griffin Dishes on Celebrities and Her New Year's Eve Broadcast Co-Host Anderson Cooper Surprises Her by Joining the Conversation!
59.plot: Comic Kathy Griffin (book "Kathy Griffin's Celebrity Run-ins", TV special "CNN New Year's Eve Live with Anderson Cooper and Kathy Griffin" (2016)); TV personality Anderson Cooper; a man thanks a co-worker for her kindness.

60.title: Shemar Moore & Bill Bellamy from "The Bounce Back"/Steve Intervenes on a Mother-Daughter Duo at Odds Over How to Run Their Restaurant
60.plot: A woman and her daughter cannot agree on how to run their business; Steve honors a Salvation Army worker as a Harvey's Hero for mentoring youth; Shemar Moore and Bill Bellamy (The Bounce Back (2016)); Greg McKeown (book, "Essentialism"); ugly sweaters.

61.title: An Update from Real Housewife Cynthia Bailey/Holiday Decorating Tips from Taniya Nayak from the Great Christmas Light Fight
61.plot: Heather's list of dating requirements is so long and ridiculous that the man she Is looking for does not exist; Cynthia Bailey (The Real Housewives of Atlanta (2008)); Taniya Nayak (The Great Christmas Light Fight (2013)).

62.title: Musical Performance by Brian McKnight!/Giada De Laurentiis Makes a Traditional Italian Holiday Meal/Joe Minoso from "Chicago Fire"
62.plot: An entrepreneur falls on hard times; Giada De Laurentiis (Giada's Holiday Handbook (2015)); Brian McKnight is interviewed and performs; Joe Minoso (Chicago Fire (2012)).

63.title: Steve Kicks Off a Week-Long Holiday Celebration! Alicia Keys Is a Celebrity Santa, with Gifts for the Studio Audience!
63.plot: Alicia Keys (The Voice (2011)); Steve helps a homeless single mother get a home for the holidays; Steve's gift-giving guide; stylist Ty Hunter brings holiday fashion advice; Steve's wife, Marjorie, sells some of her luxury designer clothes.

64.title: Moms on Strike: The Holiday Edition/Steve's Daughter Karli, Her Husband and Their Son Pose for Their Christmas Card Photo!

158.plot: Comic Gary Owen gives comedic advice on how to take the best family road trip ever; Jenni Farley (Jersey Shore (2009)) gives relationship advice to some women with summer-themed situations; Steve taste tests guests' recipes for ribs.

159.title: Dating 911: The Ex-Wives Dating Club!
159.plot: Steve brings in two best friends, who married and divorced the same man, as one of them hopes to find true love in her life; mixologist Jane Danger demonstrates how to make some popular cocktails to enjoy for the summer season.

160.title: Steve Answers Young Boys' Questions About Girls, Relationships, Dating and Love!
160.plot: Steve and his son-in-law, Ben Raymond, offer a group of boys advice on interacting with girls by giving them their most advanced lesson yet; Grammy Award-winning musician Patti LaBelle talks about her book.

161.title: Steve Celebrates Real Women with the Curvy Hour: Part II
161.plot: Model Ashley Graham discusses her book "A New Model": comic Nicole Byer, model Hunter McGrady and trainer Louise Green answer audience questions.

162.title: Fellow TV Host Andy Cohen!/What Happens During Commercial Breaks on the Show
162.plot: Andy Cohen (Watch What Happens: Live (2009), Then and Now with Andy Cohen (2015) and Love Connection (2017)); what happens during commercial breaks for the talk show; comic W. Kamau Bell.

163.title: Kelly Rowland Talks Parenthood and Her New Book, "Whoa Baby!"
163.plot: Dermatologist Dr. Ava Shamban discusses some of the most modern cosmetic procedures available to anyone who doesn't want to deal with surgery; singer Kelly Rowland talks about her home life and being a mother to a two-year-old son.

164.title: Help! I Love My Man, But He's Obsessed with His Puppets!
164.plot: A woman claims that her husband's passion as a puppeteer has begun to cause problems for their relationship with his frequent absence and messiness; dancer Cheryl Burke (Dancing with the Stars (2005)) talks about her role in the series, Dance Moms (2011), and teaching dance; a woman shows off her new figure after completing a Dherbs cleanse; the benefits of doing a cleanse.

165.title: Fredrik Eklund & Steve Gold from Bravo's "Million Dollar Listing"
165.plot: Real estate brokers Fredrik Eklund and Steve Gold, from the series Million Dollar Listing New York (2012), meet with Steve, as Fredrik talks about his 40th birthday celebration; author Patrice C. Washington helps a mother deal with her daughter's spoiled attitude.

166.title: Ne-Yo from NBC's New "World of Dance!"/Actor Larenz Tate
166.plot: Actor and singer Ne-Yo talks about his role as one of the judges for the series, World of Dance (2017) and working with late singers Michael Jackson and Prince; actor Larenz Tate (Deuces (2016) and Power (2014)) discusses growing up in Chicago and his introduction into acting; a woman helps other women reach their business dreams; a preview of the new ABC show, Steve Harvey's Funderdome (2017)); cast members from The Bachelor (2002) compete on Celebrity Family Feud (2008).

167.title: Steve Welcomes Three Viral Superstars Who Have Turned Their YouTube Channels Into Full-Time, Well-Paying Jobs!
167.plot: Steve meets with internet celebrities Justine Ezarik, Harley Morenstein and Bart Baker as they discuss the work it took to launch their careers on YouTube and help a woman wants to boost her channel by increasing her viewership count.

168.title: It's "The Wedding Hour!"/Steve Helps a Woman Whose Mom Insists
168.plot: Steve answers audience questions with a special wedding-themed "Ask Steve" and meets a couple considering getting eloped due to a meddlesome relative; architect Brian Green discusses some essential tips for planning ones wedding.

169.title: It's the "Ask Steve Hour!"/Steve Takes a Look Back at His Most
169.plot: Steve reflects on the origins of "Ask Steve" and television personality Oprah Winfrey's influence on it; singer Kelly Osbourne, actor Frank Grillo and chef Myron Mixon help Steve answer some special "Ask Steve" questions.

170.title: Dr. Terry Dubrow & Dr. Paul Nassif from E!'s "Botched"
170.plot: Doctors Terry J. Dubrow and Paul Nassif, from the series Botched (2014), talk about their peculiar friendship and meet one of their old patients; Steve honors a man who helped raise money for a woman to achieve her dream of going to nursing school; motivational speaker Bill Wooditch helps a mom who says that her teenage son lacks motivation.

171.title: Steve Celebrates Father's Day!
171.plot: Steve honors fathers by bringing in his son-in-law, Ben Raymond, who raises Steve's grandchild and helps mentor young children without fathers; Steve's friend, Frank Hallum offers inspiration for single mothers who young songs.

172.title: Steve Looks Back at the Biggest Moments from the Past Five Years
172.plot: Steve celebrates some of the show's most memorable moments; segments include the world's largest first date, a mass wedding with 50 brides, and a marriage proposal at Grand Central Station.

173.title: It's the Twins Hour!
173.plot: Steve looks back at his favorite segments featuring twins; Steve's twin daughters, Brandi Harvey and Karli Harvey; Michelle and her twin daughters, Brea and Brenna; 19-year-old triplets get a makeover.

174.title: Steve Looks Back at Some of the Crazy Things Guests Have Done in Order to Find Love
174.plot: Show highlights of people doing outrageous things in the name of love, include a woman named Monica, who is sent on extreme adventure dates; a lumberjack named Katie, who is in search of romance; and a cowgirl named Darlene.

175.title: It's the Harvey Family Hour!
175.plot: Highlights of moments on the show that featured Steve's own family, including his wife Marjorie Harvey, his seven children and four grandchildren.

176.title: Steve Remembers Some of the Most Memorable Kid Segments from the Past Five Years
176.plot: Highlights include a kids edition of Ask Steve, helping single moms struggling with raising boys, kids trying to help their single moms find romance, and Steve's daddy-daughter dance.

177.title: It's the Rubin Hour!/Steve Takes a Look Back at His Favorite Segments
177.plot: Steve reflects on some of his favorite moments featuring television warm-up man Rubin Ervin, including a time he was sent through a military boot camp and a special family reunion; Steve look back at a certain Cryotherapy treatment.

178.title: It's the "Instant Results" Hour!/Steve Gives Viewers Some Instant Satisfaction
178.plot: Steve takes a look back at some of his most noteworthy "before-and-after" moments, such as a woman who discovered her husband's infidelity, a woman who claims to be unable to escape the "friend zone" and helping a group of men learn to talk to women.

179.title: A Full Hour of Second Chance Stories!
179.plot: Some of the most memorable moments from "Steve Harvey (2012)", in which a guest is given a second chance to succeed in life, are presented, such as a man getting a second chance to give his wife the marriage proposal he had hoped for.

180.title: It's the "Family Hour!"/Steve Looks Back at His Favorite Family-Themed Moments
180.plot: Steve reflects on some of the most noteworthy and emotional moments shared between family members, including a celebrity family cook-off for charity and sending a technology-obsessed family into Amish Country to learn to disconnect; the Chrisleys vs. the Manzos.

181.title: Living the Good Life!/Segments Featuring Luxurious Items
181.plot: Steve takes a special look back on the show, such as taste-testing a $3.95 million strawberry dessert and testing expensive gadgets to see if they are worth the high price; tips from millionaires on how to get rich.

182.title: Updates with Guests from the Very First Episode of "Steve Harvey", Five Years Ago!
182.plot: Steve takes a special look back on the guests that appeared on the very first episode of the show and checks to see how they have fared in life since then, including a man who made national headlines as "America's Worst Dater".

183.title: The Cast of "The Steve Harvey Morning Show" Stops by for Their First Appearance on the Talk Show!
183.plot: Steve Joins his colleagues, Shirley Strawberry, Nephew Tommy, Junior, Carla Ferrell, Mississippi Monica and J. Anthony Brown, as they reflect on some of their favorite moments from the last 10 years of working on Steve's radio show.

184.title: Dorothy Wang & Malika Haqq from E's "Famously Single"/Joe Romeiro
184.plot: Television personality Dorothy Wang and actress Malika Haqq, from the series Famously Single (2016), discuss their struggles with dating; naturalist cinematographer Joe Romeiro talks about some of his most worrisome encounters with sharks and previews Discovery's Shark Week (1987); a 5-year-old girl who has read more than 2,000 books.

185.title: Steve Helps a Funeral Director Find Love!/Judge Lynn Toler & Steve Help a Couple
185.plot: A funeral director comes back to receive special dating assistance as he meets two women, who are questions by him and his mother; Judge Lynn Toler and Steve help a couple to decide whether they should split or recommit; Clint Harp from HGTV's Fixer Upper (2013).

imdb.plot outline: Comedian Steve Harvey's TV filmography includes starring in his own sitcom and hosting a long-running game show. He now adds a talk show to the list with this hourlong entry into the daytime talk game. Harvey, whose media work also includes hosting a morning radio show, brings a humorous, common sense approach to everyday problems as he interviews real people with real issues. Harvey draws from his own life experiences as he covers a range of topics that include relationships, finances, parenting, workplace issues and friendship.

plot: Experienced and actor '_Steve Harvey_ (qv)' (qv) brings his fresh and insightful approach to a vast range of topics including marriage, parenting, the workplace, friendships, and the daily dramas that people face in life.::Jwelch5742
